entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 70 to 90 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h. Note: A significant burst of rain during Monday afternoon and evening is expected to generate another Warning or Watch. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 120 mm of rain about the main divide, and 80 to 100 mm within 15km farther east. Peak rates of 20 to 30 mm/h expected during possible thunderstorms. Freezing/snow level 2000m. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
